SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

ca.forklabs.javaxpcom
Class Crawler

java.lang.Object
  ca.forklabs.javaxpcom.Crawler

public abstract class Crawler
extends Object

Class Crawler provides a skeleton to build web crawlers using Mozilla and SWT. This crawler gives access to a Browser object inside a simple Shell that can be interacted with to navigate the web and access the underlying nsIDOMDocument.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Daniel LÃ©onard

waitOnLatch

protected boolean waitOnLatch(long timeout,
                              TimeUnit unit)
                       throws InterruptedException
Makes the current thread wait on the latch.

Parameters:
timeout - the maximum time to wait.
unit - the time unit of the timeout argument.
Returns:
true if the count reached zero, false if the waiting time elapsed before the count reached zero.
Throws:
InterruptedException
See Also:
CountDownLatch.await(long, TimeUnit)

waitForPageToLoad

protected void waitForPageToLoad()
                          throws IOException
Blocks the thread until the web page has been loaded.

Throws:
IOException - if the web page fails to load before the timeout expires.

minimizeBrowser

public void minimizeBrowser()
Minimizes the shell enclosing the crawler. It is the opposite of restoreBrowser().

restoreBrowser

Restores the shell enclosing the crawler. It is the opposite of minimizeBrowser().

configureNewShell

protected void configureNewShell(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell)
Configures the newly created shell. This implementation does nothing.

Parameters:
shell - the new shell.

configureNewBrowser

protected void configureNewBrowser(org.eclipse.swt.browser.Browser browser)
Configures the newly created browser. This implementation does nothing. When this method is called for the first time, the only configuration that has been done to the browser is to give it the same bounds as the client area of the enclosing shell.

Parameters:
browser - the new browser.

createNewShell

protected final org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell createNewShell()
Creates a new Shell to contain a Browser.

Returns:
the shell.

public static void setupXULRunner(String gre_home)
                           throws IllegalStateException
Sets up the XULRunner so that crawlers can be used.

Parameters:
gre_home - the location of the XULRunner binaries.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if the location does not exist.
